summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence from April 24-25, 2019, discussing a meeting or briefing that occurred. The participants are coordinating a follow-up briefing and providing updates that the event 'went well' and 'covered a lot of ground.'

persons.name: Mimi
persons.context: Sends an update on April 24, 2019, stating a meeting went well and offering to brief the recipient the next day.

events.title: Evening Meeting
events.description: A meeting occurred that 'went well' and 'covered a lot of ground,' according to an update from Mimi.

keyFacts: Email chain dated April 24-25, 2019, discussing a meeting update.
A participant named Mimi reports that an evening meeting 'went well' and 'covered a lot of ground.'
The correspondents are coordinating a follow-up briefing for the next day.
The document is a brief, informal email exchange with limited substantive detail about the meeting's content.
